009package imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving;
010
011import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
012import imagingbook.common.math.VectorNorm.NormType;
013import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
014
015/**
016 * Common interface for all Bilateral filter implementations.
017 * 
018 * @author WB
019 *
020 */
021public interface BilateralF {
022        
023        /**
024         * Parameter bundle for bilateral filters (implementations of {@link BilateralF}).
025         */
026        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<BilateralF> {
027
028                @DialogLabel("Sigma (domain)")
029                public double sigmaD = 2;               
030
031                @DialogLabel("Sigma (range)")
032                public double sigmaR = 50;
033                
034                @DialogLabel("Color distance norm")
035                public NormType colorNormType = NormType.L2;
036
037        }
038
039}
